results.description: BBC Scotland speaks to Preston North End manager Alex Neil on success, dedication and the future of Scottish coaches in England.
results.shortTitle: 'I'm old fashioned, I've got morals'
results.title: Alex Neil: Preston manager on his will to work and win

results.description: Preston North End boss Alex Neil explains his approach to management and players.
results.shortTitle: I've got players that have my work ethic - Neil
results.title: I've got players that have my work ethic - Alex Neil on Preston squad

results.description: Promotion hopefuls Preston end Huddersfield's seven-match unbeaten run with a comfortable home win the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Preston cruise to win over Huddersfield
results.title: Preston North End 3-1 Huddersfield Town: Promotion hopefuls end Terriers' unbeaten run

thumbnail.altText: Alan Browne scores Preston's second goal

results.description: Preston North End drop their formal complaint of an alleged illegal approach from Stoke City for manager Alex Neil.
results.shortTitle: Preston drop complaint against Stoke
results.title: Alex Neil: Preston drop complaint against Stoke after approach for manager

results.description: In-demand Alex Neil's Preston go top of the Championship thanks to Paul Gallagher's second-half penalty against Charlton Athletic at The Valley.
results.shortTitle: Gallagher pen sends Neil's Preston top
results.title: Charlton 0-1 Preston: Paul Gallagher penalty sends Alex Neil's North End top

thumbnail.altText: Alex Neil's Preston top the Championship from Leeds United as a result of having a one-goal better goal difference

results.description: Stoke City are refused permission by Preston North End to talk to boss Alex Neil about their managerial vacancy.
results.shortTitle: Stoke refused permission to talk to Neil
results.title: Alex Neil: Stoke City refused permission by Preston North End to talk to manager

results.description: Billy Bodin signs a new contract to keep him at Preston North End until the summer of 2021.
results.shortTitle: Bodin signs new Preston contract
results.title: Billy Bodin: New contract for Preston North End forward until summer of 2021

results.description: Preston North End come from two goals down to beat Blackburn and go second in the Championship table.
results.shortTitle: Preston come from behind to beat Blackburn
results.title: Preston North End 3-2 Blackburn Rovers: Barkhuizen double inspires Preston comeback

results.description: Substitute Eddie Nketiah rescues a point for Leeds with a late equaliser against fellow promotion chasers Preston.
results.shortTitle: Nketiah goal earns Leeds draw at Preston
results.title: Preston North End 1-1 Leeds United: Eddie Nketiah scores late equaliser for Leeds

thumbnail.altText: Eddie Nketiah (left) is yet to start a Championship game for Leeds this season but has netted three goals in nine substitute appearances

results.description: Matthew Miazga scores in the eighth minute of stoppage time against Preston to give Mark Bowen a winning start as Reading boss.
results.shortTitle: Reading beat Preston in stoppage time
results.title: Reading 1-0 Preston North End: Miazga late goal secures win for Royals

results.description: The EFL and their charity partner Mind are using street art in a bid to encourage conversations about mental health.
results.shortTitle: EFL and Mind launch street art campaign
results.title: World Mental Health Day: Street art campaign launched by English Football League

results.description: Daniel Johnson scores twice as Preston thrash struggling Barnsley to move up to third in the Championship table.
results.shortTitle: In-form Preston thrash struggling Tykes
results.title: Preston North End 5-1 Barnsley: Daniel Johnson double inspires Deepdale rout

results.description: Preston North End extend their unbeaten league run to seven games with a Championship draw against Middlesbrough.
results.shortTitle: Boro bounce back to hold in-form Preston
results.title: Middlesbrough 1-1 Preston: Boro bounce back from Sheffield Wednesday thrashing

results.description: Preston North End twice fight back to draw with Bristol City in a thriller in the Championship at Deepdale.
results.shortTitle: Preston and Bristol City in thrilling draw
results.title: Preston North End 3-3 Bristol City: Preston fight back to draw eventful thriller

results.description: Holders Manchester City make light work of reaching the Carabao Cup fourth round, with Raheem Sterling and Gabriel Jesus among the scorers at Preston.
results.shortTitle: Holders Man City ease past Preston
results.title: Preston 0-3 Manchester City: Holders ease through to fourth round

results.description: League Two Colchester stun Tottenham in the Carabao Cup third round, plus Man City and Arsenal win. Action and reaction
results.shortTitle: Carabao Cup - Spurs beaten by League Two Colchester
results.title: Carabao Cup: third round latest - Man City, Spurs & Arsenal in action

results.description: Preston extend their unbeaten run to five games after Sean Maguire's first-half goal is enough to defeat Birmingham City.
results.shortTitle: Preston go third with Blues win
results.title: Birmingham City 0-1 Preston North End: Preston go third with narrow win

results.description: Sean Maguire and Tom Barkhuizen score in Preston's 2-0 win over Brentford to move the Lilywhites into the play-off places.
results.shortTitle: Preston beat Bees to move into play-offs
results.title: Preston North End 2-0 Brentford: Sean Maguire and Tom Barkhuizen score in win for Lilywhites

results.description: Accrington sign Preston striker Connor Simpson, West Ham centre-back Aji Alese and Fulham defender Jerome Opoku on loan.
results.shortTitle: Stanley sign Simpson, Alese & Opoku
results.title: Accrington Stanley sign Connor Simpson, Aji Alese & Jerome Opoku on loan

results.description: Albert Adomah's late goal off the bench rescues Nottingham Forest a 1-1 Championship draw at home to Preston North End.
results.shortTitle: Adomah rescues Forest against Preston
results.title: Nottingham Forest 1-1 Preston North End: Albert Adomah rescues Reds with equaliser
